Class Hl7v2MarshalUtils

  • java.lang.Object

extends Object
    Various helper methods for data transformation.
    Author:
    Dmytro Rud

    • Method Detail

      • marshalStandardTypes

        public static String marshalStandardTypes(org.apache.camel.Message message,
                          String charset,
                          ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.Parser parser)
                                   throws Exception
        Converts a set of some standard data types to String.
        Parameters:
        message - Camel message containing the data to be converted.
        charset - character set.
        parser - HL7 parser.
        Returns:
        String representing the original exchange or null when the data type is unknown.
        Throws:
        Exception - on parsing and marshaling errors.

      • typeSupported

        public static boolean typeSupported(Object body)
        Determines whether the given object belongs to the predefined set of supported data types.
        Parameters:
        body - The object to check.
        Returns:
        true when the type of the object is supported by the HL7v2 adapter out-of-the-box, false otherwise.

      • convertBodyToString

        public static String convertBodyToString(org.apache.camel.Message message,
                         String charset,
                         boolean defragmentSegments)
                                  throws Exception
        Converts message contents to a String using the given character set and replaces all '\n''s with '\r''s. If requested, segments will be defragmented as well.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • extractHapiMessage

        public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Message extractHapiMessage(org.apache.camel.Message message,
                                            String charset,
                                            ca.uhn.hl7v2.parser.Parser parser)
                                                     throws Exception
        Converts the contents of the given Camel message to a Message.
        Parameters:
        message - Camel message to be converted.
        charset - character set.
        parser - HL7 parser.
        Returns:
        a Message or null when it was impossible to get or create one.
        Throws:
        Exception
